item.title: 默克资深员工创立的艾康治疗公司IPO募资3.81亿美元
item.description: 由默克公司资深人士领导的晚期癌症药物开发商Eikon Therapeutics Inc.，通过扩大规模的美国首次公开募股筹集了3.812亿美元。【原文：Eikon Therapeutics Inc., a late-stage cancer drug developer led by Merck & Co. veterans, raised $381.2 million in an upsized US initial public offering.】

item.title: 台积电计划对日本芯片工厂进行重大升级，高市悠子获胜
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造公司将在日本启动先进3纳米芯片的生产，加速推进该国半导体制造计划，这标志着首相高市早苗的技术雄心取得重大进展。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. will start making advanced 3-nanometer chips in Japan, stepping up plans to manufacture semiconductors in the country in a triumph for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s technology ambitions.】

item.title: 菲律宾通胀率1月连续第二个月加速上升
item.description: 菲律宾通胀连续第二个月加速，但仍处于央行目标区间内，为进一步放松货币政策留有余地。【原文：Inflation in the Philippines accelerated for the second month in a row, but landed within the central bank’s target range, leaving room for further monetary policy easing.】

item.title: 高通、Arm受内存短缺蔓延担忧冲击
item.description: 高通公司和Arm控股公司的股价在发布季度报告后大幅下跌，市场担忧内存芯片短缺将抑制电子行业增长。【原文：Shares of Qualcomm Inc. and Arm Holdings Plc fell steeply after the semiconductor companies delivered quarterly reports, hurt by concern that a shortage of memory chips will crimp growth in the electronics industry.】

item.title: 松下股价因重组预期创2014年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 松下控股公司股价飙升15%，创2014年以来最大涨幅，因投资者预期历时多年的重组将在下个财年初见成效。【原文：Panasonic Holdings Corp. shares soared by 15%, the most since 2014, on bolstered investor hopes that a years-long restructuring will start paying off in the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 新加坡吉宝集团因出售电信业务亏损，利润下滑
item.description: 新加坡跨国集团转型的资产管理公司吉宝集团公布年度盈利下滑，尽管业务表现有所改善，但激进推进资产剥离过程中产生的亏损掩盖了这一积极态势。【原文：Singapore conglomerate-turned-asset manager Keppel Ltd. reported a drop in annual earnings after losses sustained in an aggressive push to divest assets overshadowed an improvement in its business performance.】

item.title: 港元走软，宽松流动性助推套利交易
item.description: 港元兑美元汇率持续走低，逼近8月以来最低水平。银行体系内过剩的现金刺激了套利交易者对这种与美元挂钩的货币进行做空押注。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar drifted down to near the weakest level since August as excess cash in the banking system spurred carry trade bets against the pegged currency.】

item.title: 瑞穗策略师认为日本债务买家罢工将在投票后结束
item.description: 据瑞穗证券策略师称，本周末日本举行提前大选后，投资者可能重返长期日本国债市场。大型资产管理公司指出，10年期国债收益率触及2.5%可能是触发买盘的信号。【原文：Investors may return to longer-dated Japanese debt after this weekend’s snap election, with big asset managers pinpointing 10-year yields reaching 2.5% as a possible trigger to buy, according to a Mizuho strategist.】

item.title: 中国百度批准最高50亿美元的股票回购计划
item.description: 百度公司批准了一项为期多年的股票回购计划，回购规模最高达50亿美元，并计划于2026年首次派发股息，由此确立了重大的股东回报计划。【原文：Baidu Inc. authorized a multi-year stock buyback program of as much as $5 billion and plans to issue its first dividend in 2026, establishing a major shareholder return plan.】

item.title: 日元汇率创10月以来最大单周跌幅，大选前夕承压
item.description: 日元正朝着自去年10月以来最大单周跌幅迈进，交易员们正为日本首相高市早苗领导的自民党在本周末选举中取得压倒性胜利做准备。【原文：The yen is on track for its biggest weekly drop since October, as traders brace for a decisive victory by Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s Liberal Democratic Party in this weekend’s election.】

item.title: 英格兰银行维持利率不变，谨慎态度主导：决策指南
item.description: 尽管英国劳动力市场引发的担忧日益加剧，但英国央行周四几乎肯定会维持利率不变，等待更多通胀得到控制的证据。【原文：The Bank of England will almost certainly leave interest rates on hold on Thursday and wait for more evidence that inflation is under control, despite mounting concerns about the UK labor market.】

item.title: 韩国债务在亚洲最易受美国国债收益率曲线陡峭化影响
item.description: 彭博社分析显示，在亚洲新兴市场中，韩国主权债券对美国国债收益率曲线陡峭化的影响最为敏感。【原文：South Korea’s sovereign bonds are the most vulnerable in emerging Asia to a steepening US Treasury curve, according to a Bloomberg analysis.】

item.title: 为何提前大选对日本领导人而言是场豪赌
item.description: 日本正准备举行众议院提前选举，这场选举可能在经济压力和地区局势不确定的时刻重塑该国的政治格局。【原文：Japan is preparing for a snap lower-house election that could reshape the country’s political balance at a moment of economic strain and regional uncertainty.】

item.title: 万亿美元科技股崩盘，人工智能领域所有股票无一幸免
item.description: 自ChatGPT三年前进入主流视野以来，人工智能驱动的抛售已屡见不鲜。然而，本周席卷股票和信贷市场的暴跌，其规模之大堪称空前。【原文：There have been many AI-driven selloffs in the three years since ChatGPT burst into the mainstream. Nothing, though, quite rivals the rout rippling through stock and credit markets this week.】

item.title: 美联储官员库克称央行必须保持通胀可信度
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎·库克表示，央行必须通过在近期将通胀率降至目标水平来维护其公信力。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said it’s essential the central bank maintain its credibility by returning inflation to target in the near future.】

item.title: 金价连续第三日上涨，从历史性市场暴跌中复苏
item.description: 金价回升，重新站上每盎司5000美元关口，因在创纪录高位暴跌后，逢低买盘持续抢购黄金。【原文：Gold rose, pushing back above $5,000 an ounce, as dip buyers continued to snap up bullion after a historic plunge from an all-time high.】

item.title: 伊朗确认美伊谈判定于周五举行，油价应声下跌
item.description: 油价在伊朗确认将与美国举行谈判后出现三日来首次下跌，这缓解了对该欧佩克产油国实施军事打击的迫在眉睫的风险。【原文：Oil fell for the first time in three days after Iran confirmed it would hold negotiations with the US, easing the immediate risk of military strikes against the OPEC producer.】

item.title: 中国股市面临新困扰，税务部门加强监管力度
item.description: 中国股市正面临新的阻力，因北京正加大力度征收企业税，此举可能对脆弱经济中的企业盈利构成压力。【原文：Chinese stocks are encountering a fresh hurdle as Beijing ramps up efforts to collect corporate taxes, a move that threatens to pressure earnings in a fragile economy.】

item.title: 押注大田市胜选 日本股市开启反弹之路
item.description: 股市投资者正押注首相高市早苗在本周日赢得决定性选举胜利，认为强有力的授权将使她能够巩固权力并推行扩张性财政政策。【原文：Stock investors are positioning for a decisive election victory by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi this Sunday, betting that a strong mandate will allow her to consolidate power and push through expansive fiscal policies.】

item.title: 据称亿万富豪家族正考虑以20亿美元出售泰国峰会
item.description: 知情人士透露，泰国峰集团——东南亚国家最大的汽车零部件制造商——正考虑出售其业务。此举源于全球向电动汽车转型带来的日益增大的压力、政治不确定性以及家族继承断层等因素。【原文：Thai Summit Group, the Southeast Asian country’s largest auto-parts manufacturer, is weighing a sale of its business amid mounting pressure from the global shift to electric vehicles, political uncertainty and family succession gaps, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼关键时刻为印度式反弹创造空间
item.description: 明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）即将下调评级的消息，已将印尼股市拖入一代人难遇的暴跌深渊。【原文：A looming MSCI Inc. downgrade has plunged Indonesia’s stock market into a once-in-a-generation rout.】

item.title: 软件股暴跌背后：所谓"SaaS末日"的真相
item.description: 自ChatGPT问世约三年来，分析师们不断警告称，包括软件编程、法律服务和电影制作在内的整个行业都面临着被人工智能颠覆的风险。【原文：Since ChatGPT arrived on the scene some three years ago, analysts have been warning that entire industries, including software programming, legal services and film production, are at risk of being disrupted by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 思时科技同意以29亿美元收购瑞萨电子时序业务部门
item.description: 模拟芯片制造商SiTime公司已同意以现金加股票交易方式收购瑞萨电子的时序业务部门，交易价值约29亿美元。【原文：Analog chipmaker SiTime Corp. has agreed to acquire Renesas Electronics Corp.’s timing unit in a cash-and-stock transaction valued at about $2.9 billion.】

item.title: 旗舰资本支持的生物医药公司Generate Biomedicines提交美国IPO申请
item.description: 生物医药生成公司提交首次公开募股申请，加入了生物技术企业抢占公开市场的行列。随着投资者对该领域的青睐，此类企业正不断涌现。【原文：Generate Biomedicines Inc. filed for an initial public offering, joining a growing list of biotechnology firms to leap to public markets as investors embrace the sector.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，科技股领跌势头加快：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市料将跟随美股下挫，因科技股抛售步伐加快。比特币延续跌势。【原文：Asian stocks were set to follow US shares lower as selling in technology stocks gained pace. Bitcoin extended its selloff.】

item.title: 私募股权投资回报率提升助力大都会人寿利润跃升
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司第四季度盈利超出分析师预期，私募股权投资回报率上升推动该保险公司投资收益大幅增长。【原文：MetLife Inc.’s fourth-quarter earnings beat analysts’ expectations, with higher private equity returns propelling a jump in the insurer’s investment income.】

item.title: 日本周末选举引发30年期国债发售前的谨慎态度
item.description: 交易员正密切关注周四日本30年期国债拍卖中需求疲软的迹象，距离备受瞩目的众议院选举仅剩数日。【原文：Traders are watching out for signs of weak demand at Thursday’s sale of 30-year Japanese government bonds, just days before Sunday’s closely monitored lower house election.】

item.title: 中国加速能源建设，马斯克称其为人工智能竞赛的关键
item.description: 中国持续扩张的能源设施新数据印证了埃隆·马斯克和黄仁勋的警告：该国世界领先的电力网络将在人工智能主导权竞争中为其赢得压倒性优势。【原文：New data on China’s relentless energy installations underscore warnings from Elon Musk and Jensen Huang that the nation’s world-beating power network will deliver a major advantage over the US in the race to dominate artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚猛烈抨击科技巨头在打击儿童性虐待方面存在失职
item.description: 澳大利亚网络安全监管机构严厉批评包括Meta Platforms Inc.、苹果公司和谷歌在内的科技巨头，指责其未能在平台上根除儿童性剥削和性虐待行为，尽管监管机构已多次呼吁其解决相关漏洞。【原文：Australia’s online safety regulator blasted major technology companies including Meta Platforms Inc., Apple Inc. and Google for failing to stamp out child sexual exploitation and abuse on their services, even after repeated calls to address shortfalls.】

item.title: 法官称三色创始人可动用保险金应对欺诈指控
item.description: 三色控股公司创始人朱丹尼尔因次级汽车贷款公司倒闭案面临联邦欺诈指控，周三法官裁定允许其动用公司保险单支付辩护费用。【原文：Tricolor Holdings founder Daniel Chu, who faces federal fraud charges related to the collapse of the subprime auto-loan firm, won court approval to use company insurance policies to pay for his defense costs, a judge ruled Wednesday.】
